title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Stay where you are, says health minister as SA's cases rise to 709
description: South Africa now has 709 confirmed cases of the novel coronavirus, Health Minister Zweli Mkhize says.
content:
South Africa now has 709 confirmed cases of the novel coronavirus, Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize said in an interview on SABC News on Wednesday.
This is a 28% increase in cases since Tuesday.
